name: Grid Cells and Subgrid Registration
description: Register horizontal grid cells and subgrid(s) together
title: [EMD] Grid Cells and Subgrid:

field_guidance.grid_purpose:
**Examples:**
- 'Mass variables on regular lat-lon grid for atmosphere at 1.25° × 0.9°'
- 'Ocean velocities on ORCA1 tripolar grid'
- 'Spectral coefficients for T127 truncation'

**Tip:** Include component type and resolution to distinguish from similar grids.
field_guidance.num_subgrids:
**Common patterns:**
- **1 subgrid**: Unstaggered grids (mass and velocity same location)
- **2 subgrids**: Staggered grids (Arakawa-C with separate mass/velocity positions)
- **2 subgrids**: Spectral grids (physical + spectral representation)

**Most models use 2 subgrids for atmosphere and ocean.**
field_guidance.subgrid1_variable_type:
**Variable types:**
- **mass**: Temperature, pressure, density, tracers, moisture
- **x-velocity**: U component (longitude direction)
- **y-velocity**: V component (latitude direction)
- **velocity**: Full vector (for unstructured grids)

**For Arakawa-C:** Subgrid 1 usually has 'mass', Subgrid 2 has 'x-velocity' and 'y-velocity'
field_guidance.subgrid1_grid_type:
**Most common:**
- **regular-latitude-longitude**: Standard uniform lat-lon spacing
- **reduced-gaussian**: Gaussian grid with fewer points near poles
- **linear-spectral-gaussian**: Spectral transform representation
- **tripolar**: Ocean grid with 3 poles (Arctic split)
- **cubed-sphere**: Equal-area high-resolution atmosphere
- **unstructured-polygon**: Flexible irregular mesh
field_guidance.subgrid1_x_resolution:
**Guidelines:**
- For lat-lon grids: degrees (e.g., 1.25)
- For spectral: leave blank, use truncation_number instead
- Omit if resolution varies >25% across domain
- Provide representative/nominal value if varies slightly
field_guidance.subgrid1_n_cells:
**Calculation tips:**
- Regular lat-lon: (360/x_res) × (180/y_res)
- For 1.25° × 0.9°: 288 × 200 = 57,600 cells
- Reduced Gaussian: varies, check model documentation
- Leave blank for adaptive/variable grids
field_guidance.truncation_number:
**Common values:**
- T42 (spectral truncation 42)
- T63 (spectral truncation 63)
- T127 (spectral truncation 127)
- T255 (spectral truncation 255)

**Only for spectral/Gaussian grids**
